phrase.item: Wakhan is, Wakhan is, Wakhan is the liver of the world.
Wakhan is, Wakhan is, Wakhan is the wing of the world.
My beautiful Wakhan is for me, for me it is my soul.
For me it is my dearest and my soul.
I saw [a kind of flower] in Wakhan, and I saw thousands of trees and sycamores.
From the light of the sun it is always bright, I saw a partridge, a flower, and a drunken mountain goat.
I am a thousand times thankful for my Wakhan, for its partridges, drunken flowers, and pure sky.
From the light of the sun it is always bright, I am a thousand times thankful for my Wakhan.
